title: Want to be a Web3Ladies Contributor?
description: Be a part of a community of confident and audacious Web3 Ladies. We are always open to new members.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description: Maintain deep understanding of social media metrics, data analysis and ownership of data touchpoints. Contributes and presents strategy, learnings and recommendations to senior leadership via  meetings and document writing
